        public void testCalculatesHexadecimalPositiveLargeAddition()
                                                    throws InvalidNumberFormatException,
                                                           InvalidEquationException
        Test method for Rotaluclac's calculate method. Sees if we can properly calculate addition between two Large, positive numbers in base-16 (hexadecimal).
        Throws:
        InvalidEquationException
        InvalidNumberFormatException
